name: Tampere University
goal: The mission of the Tampere University is to promote free research and academic and artistic education, to provide higher education based on research specified by legislation on universities. Tampere University in an independent, multidisciplinary science and art community whose activities are based on the research and teaching, including high-quality medicine, economics, technology and social sciences, as well as new types of multidisciplinary research and teaching arising from these fields.
interests: Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: EU Comission research funding, higher education, science politics, economic, environment, health
